channel.title: Default Windows frame in googe chrome?
channel.description: Hello, everyone. Like many, I've making the switch to Chrome., and there is one thing that I really don't like. The frame around it (the part with close button, minimize, ect.) doesn't really fit in with my computer, as I'm using a custom windows theme. Is there any way I can use the regular windows frame in Google Chrome?

item.title: Default Windows frame in googe chrome?
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
Sometimes my Chrome window messes up and the default min/max/close buttons are drawn in the corner of the window, over the Chrome ones… then all gets redrawn back when I move the window around.

Read full topic

item.title: Default Windows frame in googe chrome?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
The chrome skin is grey on grey… and your background is black on grey with green. What color did you want chrome to be?

Perhaps I need to stop chiming in here, cuz I dont see anything obviously glaringly ugly. Other than the firefox window.

item.title: Default Windows frame in googe chrome?

item.description:
